pages.text: The sister sigil to the $(l:sigil/water)Water Sigil,$(/l) the $(item)Lava Sigil$() creates a source block of lava where you click on the ground for the cost of 1000LP. Crafted in an $(l:alchemy_array/arcane_ash)Alchemy Array$(/l) using a $(item)Lava Reagent$() and a $(item)Blank Slate,$() it'll drain 5 hearts from you if you don't have enough LP in your $(l:altar/soul_network)Soul Network.$(/l)

pages.text: The Lava Sigil, next to its crafting array, plus its primary use.
